description:
I cannot generate etc/nova.conf.sample. Below is the command I executed. I'm using nova stable/juno, last commit id: 8526a727dc20a96d7245ae836e81c29967166f77.

$ git clone https://github.com/openstack/nova.git
Cloning into 'nova'...
remote: Counting objects: 299718, done.

Receiving objects: 100% (299718/299718), 203.27 MiB | 5.58 MiB/s, done.
Resolving deltas: 100% (233815/233815), done.
$ cd nova
$ git checkout stable/juno
Branch stable/juno set up to track remote branch stable/juno from origin.
Switched to a new branch 'stable/juno'

title: Cannot generate sample nova.conf in juno/stable: Unable to import module nova.test

comments.content:
For OS and python version I'm using:

$ uname -a
Linux play-openstack-01.novalocal 3.10.0-123.6.3.el7.x86_64 #1 SMP Wed Aug 6 21:12:36 UTC 2014 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
$ cat /etc/centos-release 
CentOS Linux release 7.0.1406 (Core) 
$ python --version
Python 2.7.5
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~accelazh

comments.content:
Found the error:

Error importing module nova.test: No module named mox

After 'pip install mox' everything goes fine.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~accelazh

comments.content: Thanks for confirming that it's not a bug.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~smurugesan
